content.question: The personification of “Echo,” “Song,” and “Beauty” in the second stanza (lines 5-8) mainly serves to

choices.label: convey the sense of companionship that the speaker finds in nature
contrast different aspects of nature that the speaker experiences
introduce characters that are developed over the course of the poem
emphasize the speaker’s passivity when looking at natural scenery

content.answer: convey the sense of companionship that the speaker finds in nature

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
